task_units.name: Search for and select a specific music album
sub_actions: CLICK: Search result matching the artist or album
CLICK: Option to purchase or view details

task_units.name: Filter and select music items based on criteria
sub_actions: CLICK: Add to cart or purchase option

task_units.name: Find and interact with artist's top tracks
sub_actions: CLICK: Search result matching the artist
CLICK: Top tracks or popular tracks section
CLICK: Play or like option for a track

task_units.name: Create and manage a music playlist
sub_actions: TYPE: Track or artist name to search

task_units.name: Search for and interact with music tabs or chords
sub_actions: CLICK: Search result matching the song or artist
SELECT: Tuning or other specific criteria
CLICK: High rated or popular option
CLICK: Add to favorites or playlist

task_units.name: Follow an artist and interact with their content
sub_actions: CLICK: Search result matching the artist
CLICK: Popular tracks or albums section
CLICK: Play or add to playlist option

task_units.name: Explore music by genre or time period
Interact with music charts
sub_actions: SELECT: Time frame (e.g., weekly, all time)

task_units.name: Search for and like or repost music content
sub_actions: TYPE: Search term (e.g., genre, artist, album)
CLICK: Search result matching the term

task_units.name: Filter music search results
sub_actions: SELECT: Filter criteria (e.g., difficulty, type, time period)
